sentences.en: And if you restock the shelves , they will steal it again.
sentences.cn: 如果你再度存储, 他们会再盗一次.

sentences.en: I have to restock the freezer.
sentences.cn: 我得往冰箱里再放点东西。

sentences.en: Manufacturers are testing a system that tracks products leaving the shelves and alerts employees to restock.
sentences.cn: 制造商们正在测试一个系统，它可以追踪离架的货品并提醒雇员补充上货。

sentences.en: Meet with appropriate departments to discuss current material inventories and establish restock levels or just - in - time strategies.
sentences.cn: 与相关部门会谈讨论目前得物料存货,建立再储存水准或及时战略.

sentences.en: When the item sells the suppliers can restock it.
sentences.cn: 商品卖出后供货商就会再进货.

sentences.en: You can repair the torn sails and restock the ship and supply fresh navigation charts.
sentences.cn: 你可以修复破烂的船再次扬帆继续着你的新鲜海上航行.

trans.tran_en: If you restock something such as a shelf, refrigerator, or shop, you fill it with food or other goods to replace what you have used or sold
